definition: almanac
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
book/letter/document/CL:本[ben3],冊|册[ce4],部[bu4]/to write

sentences.english: The little girl appears to be reading cartoon books.
sentences.chinese: 這個小女孩好像正在讀卡通書。

sentences.english: The prices of these cartoons range from ten yuan to a hundred.
sentences.chinese: 這些卡通書的價格從十元到一百元不等。

sentences.english: There are many pictures in a cartoon.
The almanac says that today is a suitable day for going out.
sentences.chinese: 通書上說今天是個吉日，宜出行。

definition: letter/also written 書札|书札
to check and correct
to mark a text with dots and circles/to punctuate
Tao Zongyi (c. 1329-1410), Yuan dynasty scholar
regular script (Chinese calligraphic style)
Shen Yue (441-513), writer and historian during Liang of Southern dynasties 南朝梁, compiler of History of Song of the Southern dynasties 宋書|宋书
School of Mind/Neo-Confucian Idealistic School (from Song to mid-Qing times, c. 1000-1750, typified by the teachings of Wang Yangming 王陽明|王阳明[Wang2 Yang2 ming2])
study of classic texts, including interpretation, glossaries and commentaries
to transcribe/to make a fair copy
(old) to instruct the young/to teach a child to read and write/as easy as ABC
to be confused/to be at a loss/Taiwan pr. [fa1 meng2]
variant character/loan word/variant written form (for the same word)/different edition
to write a book advancing one's theory (idiom)
Baopuzi, collection of essays by Ge Hong 葛洪[Ge3 Hong2] on alchemy, immortality, legalism, society etc
Huangting Jing, one of the primary scriptures of Daoism
A New Account of the Tales of the World, collection of anecdotes, conversations, remarks etc of historic personalities, compiled and edited by Liu Yiqing 劉義慶|刘义庆[Liu2 Yi4 qing4]
Ji Yun (1724-1805), Qing Dynasty writer, author of supernatural novel Notes on a Minutely Observed Thatched Hut 閱微草堂筆記|阅微草堂笔记
